duties_responsibilities.duty: Solve real world engineering problems involving the design, testing and/or manufacturing of Cooling Systems parts for HD trucks.
Lead and/or contribute to the develop of advanced concept.
Develop parts in Creo CAD system and manage product documentations.
Work closely with simulation engineers to ensure the components meet the performance requirements with a heavy focus on minimizing power consumption.
Lead and/or contribute to the validation requirements to ensure the durability requirements are achieved.

education_certification.credential: Must be enrolled and pursuing a degree in Mechanical Engineering at an accredited school and have completed 30 semester hours of undergraduate studies.
